name: SecondaryHypertensionHTN_HD_ICD10
title: Secondary Hypertension (HTN)_HD_ICD10
description: b.well created value set by Sr. Clinical Business Analyst for Secondary Hypertension Condition.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The intent of this value set is for the purpose of defining the clinical codes that constitute Secondary Hypertension Condition for inclusion and utilization in patients/users connected heath.),(Data Element Scope: Secondary Hypertension Condition for b.well.),(Inclusion Criteria: Secondary Hypertension ICD10 Codes that constitute the Primary Hypertension Condition for b.well.),(Exclusion Criteria: N/A)
